traits.Keen Smell: The leucrotta has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
traits.Kicking Retreat: If the leucrotta attacks with its hooves, it can take the Disengage action as a bonus action.
traits.Mimicry: The leucrotta can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14+1d4 + 12 Wisdom (Insight) check.
traits.Rampage: When the leucrotta reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, it can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make an attack with its hooves.

actions.Multiattack: The leucrotta makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its hooves.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage. If the leucrotta scores a critical hit, it rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.
actions.Hooves: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
